sentences.en: It seems that humankind is to be destroyed because they irritate the gods with their tumult and noise.
sentences.cn: 似乎是人类是要被毁灭的，因为人类的骚乱和噪音惹怒众神。

sentences.en: The humankind can culture shii-take with sawdust.
sentences.cn: 人们可以用木屑栽培香菇。

sentences.en: Humankind has entered a new century.
